Q1.question: Q1. Thinking about your current personal economic situation, how would you describe it?

QSPKrec.question: QSPKrec. Which of these two statements is closest to your opinion even if neither is exactly right?

options.1: People should be allowed to speak their opinions publicly even if they upset other people
options.2: Harmony with others is more important than the right to speak one's opinion

QCRITrec.question: QCRITrec. Do you think people who disagree with our government's actions should or should not be able to publicy criticize the government?

options.1: Yes, should be able to publicly criticize the government
options.2: No, should not be able to publicly criticize the government

QGOVrec.question: QGOVrec. Some feel that we should rely on a democatic form of government to solve [COUNTRY]'s problems. Others feel that we should rely on a leader with a strong hand to solve [COUNTRY]'s problems. Which comes closer to your opinion?

Q25b.question: Q25b. In your opinion, can a person be truly [RELSING] if they do each of the following things? b. do not respect [COUNTRY]

Q38a.question: Q38a. If you were planning the funeral for a family member/loved one, how important would it be to...? a. Invite [a monk or learned person/an imam or sheikh/a priest or pastor/a pundit or learned person] to recite sacred texts or preach
